name: BLAST-AXIS Demo
detailed_description:
In your hands, a defunct wrecking drone becomes a lethal tool. Fly through twisting, turning 3D levels with six degrees of freedom in zero gravity. Find powerful weapons and engage your enemies in frantic battles. Weld fuse boxes to restore power and open new paths through facilities to reach the exit airlock. Only your superior combat skills can retake the Phobean moon and save it from complete destruction.

Try the game out before purchasing with this free demo. Contains the first 3 levels of the full game. Y

For a complete game description, consult the main game page for BLAST-AXIS.

short_description: Expel extra-dimensional invaders from Phobos with hot lead & high explosives. Boost & kick your wrecking drone to extreme speeds on every axis. Explore the cavernous Phobean moon complex, salvage powerful weapons & blast away the uninvited guests in: BLAST-AXIS: PHOBEAN TERROR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8, 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual core, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Capable, 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xinput gamepads supported, mouse/keyboard recommended.
